title: Virtual Truth or Dare Questions to Keep Things Interesting

steps.title: Truth:
steps.content: Truth: Who do you like? 😏

steps.title: Dare:
steps.content: Dare: DM your crush.

steps.title: Truth:
steps.content: Truth: Have you ever done something illegal?

steps.title: Dare:
steps.content: Dare: Send me a selfie making the funniest face you can.

steps.title: Truth:
steps.content: Truth: What was your worst rejection?

steps.title: Dare:
steps.content: Dare: Send a love letter to a random Instagram follower.

steps.title: Truth:
steps.content: Truth: What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve done?

steps.title: Dare:
steps.content: Dare: Post your most embarrassing story on Facebook.

steps.title: Truth:
steps.content: Truth: What’s the grossest thing you’ve done?

steps.title: Dare:
steps.content: Dare: Eat a spoonful of mayonnaise and send me a pic.

steps.content: Truth: When were you last embarrassed? [2] X Research source
